paper_abstract: We investigate the properties of the multi-poly-Cauchy numbers c(n)((k1,...,kr)) and polynomials c(n)((k1,...,kr)) (z), which are generalizations of poly-Cauchy numbers c(n)((k)) and polynomials c(n)((k))(z), introduced by the third author. We also study a complex variable function Z(k1,..,kr) (s, z) interpolating the multi-poly-Cauchy polynomial c(n)((k1,...,kr)) (z).
